Action.author: harsha544
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu ~SriramaSharma has already worked on a PR that fixes above issue as such re-assigning this task to him.

Action.author: sriramasharma
Action.body: The latest JDK fix pack is 1.8.0_sr5fp26. Updating the jvm download url to point to latest fix pack will fix the build issue. Working on a patch. Will push it for review soon.

Action.author: harsha544
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu This fixes the issue you reported, can you re-trigger the fabric-baseimage build job on ppc64le as well please ?
